about: Full Stack Developer passionate about technology and innovation, with 7 years of experience in backend and frontend application development. Motivated, self-taught, and team-oriented, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to continue growing professionally.

experience.tasks: Implement and refactor web components for the airline's administrative application, improve user experience, and optimize performance on iOS devices for passenger booking and check-in.
I developed a web system (CRM) for a debt repair company and an investment fund, including PDF report generation, lead assignment to advisors, and management of savings and investment accounts.

I am developing a web application that centralizes work order management for maintenance and incidents in a public transportation company. The solution optimizes operational dispatches, calculates productivity in unit deployment, and consolidates all information in a control center for tracking.
